SeaScape Global Classes information with average values per Class

Source: R/data.R
ss_gl_classes.Rd

Average properties of Seascape Global Classes.

ss_gl_classes

Format

A table of average values per class:

CLASS

unique integer identifier of the Class

NAME

descriptive name

SST (°C)

sea surface temperature in degrees Celsius

SSS (psu)

sea surface salinity in Practical Salt Units

ADT (m)

absolute dynamic topography in meters

ICE (%)

ice as percent cover, if present

CDOM (m^-1)

colored dissolved organic matter per square meter

CHLA (mg m^-3)

Chlorophyll a per cubic meter

NFLH (W m^-2 um^-1 sr^-1)

normalized fluorescence line height

NFLH:CHL

normalized fluorescence line height chlorophyll component

LATITUDE

latitude

DOMINANT HEMISPHERE

dominant hemisphere

DOMINANT SEASON

dominant season

Source

CLASS comment from ERDDAP - Monthly Global Seascapes - Data Access Form
